name: Tatooine Sandstorm
description: A tequila-based cocktail with a hint of citrus and spice, evoking the harsh desert climate of Tatooine.

name: Endor Elixir
description: A refreshing, earthy cocktail made with foraged forest ingredients, perfect for the lush moon of Endor.

name: Hoth Haze
description: A blustery, ice-cold cocktail that captures the frozen tundra of the planet Hoth.

name: Alderaan Ale
description: A rich, malty ale with a subtle floral aroma, inspired by the lost planet of Alderaan.

name: Kashyyyk Cooler
description: A tropical, fruit-forward cocktail that evokes the lush, jungle-like forests of Kashyyyk.

name: Bespin Breeze
description: A light, bubbly cocktail with a hint of citrus and cloud-like texture, reminiscent of the floating cities of Bespin.

name: Mandalore Mule
description: A spicy, bold cocktail inspired by the warrior culture of the planet Mandalore.

name: Mustafar Merlot
description: A dark, brooding red wine with a hint of smoke and ash, evoking the hellish landscape of the planet Mustafar.

name: Kamino Kolada
description: A tropical, creamy cocktail that pays homage to the rainy, ocean-covered planet of Kamino.

name: Naboo Nectar
description: A delicate, floral and fruity cocktail that celebrates the lush, idyllic planet of Naboo.
